text: 1.7-8: Mt 25.31; 1 Te 3.13; 4.161.7-8: Sng 79.6; Ais 66.15; Jer 10.25; Ro 2.8; 1 Pi 4.17Nde ntige mba ndi simtɨgi, ana nta vhɨzgip, vhuksur nden nɨɨŋv, vhɨra nzan nɨɨnga. Nza Bakɨme Zisas won enseri ŋkasŋkagir kov, mbe Hevenan kegɨp, kɨrar hɨrga tugar, Fhe Bakɨme maaŋ muunga. Ana vhava bakɨ guarara phorgɨ zirɨrga. Ana zirɨv, Fhe Bakɨme kangeŋ thagi gumgi gu mbigi gum, nza Bakɨme Zisas buna vhuueŋ mbararargeŋ thagi gumgi gu mbigi, ana muumbara mbatɨgar mben muuŋgirga.
